title: Update pyproject.toml brand references
description: Update package name, description, and CLI entry point from AiNiee to TranslateFlow

title: Update version.json brand string
description: Update version string from AiNiee-Next to TranslateFlow

title: Update I18N files (en.json, zh_CN.json, ja.json)
description: Update menu titles and notification strings from AiNiee to TranslateFlow

title: Update README.md and README_EN.md
description: Update documentation with TranslateFlow branding

title: Update Web UI brand references
description: Update index.html, package.json, and constants.ts in Tools/WebServer

title: Update cache and output folder names
description: Update CacheManager.py and TaskConfig.py file naming

title: Update UpdateManager.py GitHub URLs
description: Update GitHub repository URLs and User-Agent header

title: Update I18N files (en.json, zh_CN.json, ja.json)
description: Replace AiNiee branding with TranslateFlow in I18N files

title: Update README.md and README_EN.md
description: Replace AiNiee branding with TranslateFlow in README files

title: Update cache and output folder names
description: Rename cache/output folders containing old brand name

title: Update UpdateManager.py GitHub URLs
description: Update GitHub repository URLs in UpdateManager.py

title: Create database configuration module
description: Create ModuleFolders/Infrastructure/Database/pgsql.py with proper PostgreSQL connection setup using environment variables. Include connection pooling and database initialization utilities.

title: Implement email service for notifications
description: Create ModuleFolders/Service/Email/email_service.py with email sending capabilities for verification and password reset. Support SMTP and Resend API.

title: Implement password reset flow
description: Add forgot-password and reset-password endpoints to AuthManager. Create email templates and token verification logic. Update web_server.py with /api/v1/auth/forgot-password and /api/v1/auth/reset-password endpoints.

title: Implement email verification flow
description: Add email verification token generation and verification to AuthManager. Create /api/v1/auth/verify-email endpoint. Add verification status checks to login.

title: Create OAuth manager for third-party login
description: Create ModuleFolders/Service/Auth/oauth_manager.py with GitHub and Google OAuth integration. Implement OAuth flow handlers and user account linking.

title: Create User service for profile management
description: Create ModuleFolders/Service/User/ with UserManager.py, UserProfile.py, UserRepository.py. Add user CRUD operations and profile update endpoints.

title: Build Billing service structure
description: Create ModuleFolders/Service/Billing/ folder structure with subscription_models.py, SubscriptionManager.py, UsageTracker.py, PaymentProcessor.py base classes.

title: Implement Stripe payment integration
description: Add stripe integration to Billing service. Implement subscription creation, plan management, and webhook handling. Requires stripe python library.

title: Implement usage tracking system
description: Create UsageTracker to track character counts, API calls, storage usage. Add usage endpoints /api/v1/usage/current and /api/v1/usage/history.

title: Implement quota enforcement middleware
description: Create QuotaEnforcer to check user quotas before processing requests. Add middleware to web_server.py for quota validation on translation endpoints.

title: 实现用户管理 API 路由
description: 在 web_server.py 中添加用户管理相关的 API 路由：GET/PUT/DELETE /api/v1/users/me, GET /api/v1/users (管理员), GET/PUT/DELETE /api/v1/users/{id} (管理员)

title: 实现订阅管理 API 路由
description: 在 web_server.py 中添加订阅管理相关的 API 路由：GET /api/v1/subscriptions/plans, POST /api/v1/subscriptions, GET/PUT/DELETE /api/v1/subscriptions/current, GET /api/v1/subscriptions/invoices

title: 实现用量管理 API 路由
description: 在 web_server.py 中添加用量管理相关的 API 路由：GET /api/v1/usage/current, GET /api/v1/usage/history, GET /api/v1/usage/daily

title: 实现 OAuth API 路由
description: 在 web_server.py 中添加 OAuth 相关的 API 路由：GET /api/v1/auth/oauth/{provider}, GET /api/v1/auth/oauth/callback, GET /api/v1/auth/oauth/accounts, DELETE /api/v1/auth/oauth/accounts/{provider}

title: 更新 changelog1.md 进度
description: 完成 API 路由实现后，更新 changelog1.md 中的进度百分比和详细实现记录

title: 实现团队管理基础功能
description: 创建 TeamManager 服务,实现团队创建、成员邀请、角色分配等功能。依赖 User 和 Tenant 模型。
